title: UrgoD
body: RIP Urgod. I´m missing him already. New Urgot shit. I want my Urgod back :-(

replies.body: But he is a god on him...so urgod i guess :D

Some who has no idea of urgot is talking I see.
The old urgot was kinda ok but not nearly as strong as the new one.
New urgot is legit broken , its just a completely different playstyle

they took urGOD. and turned him into a fat ugly useless crab. called urgot. For gods sake im so sad i cant tell u. I just had to write this. Im deleting now. Thank u riot. Call me if u rechange this catastrophe u called "update"
Nein, werden die nicht. Also werden wir dich nie wieder sehen (was denke ich kein herber Verlust sein wird).
